links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,22,print(floor(Pi^n+exp(1)^n)))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); e=exp(1); for (n=0, 200, write("b061675.txt", n, " ", floor(Pi^n + e^n)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 26 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 26 2001
